languages.text: Поскольку род Зауэрбэков был истреблен в наказание за измену, Леди Иокаста сочла невозможным завести семью и дать жизнь потомкам. Она посвятила себя вере в Бога-Императора, взяв под опеку один из крупных столичных храмов. Снискав славу строгой, но набожной матроны, она умерла в преклонном возрасте, и предсмертные ее слова было некому принять, кроме золотой иконы Бога-Императора, установленной в ее покоях.

Since the Sauerback family had been wiped out as punishment for their treason, Jocasta believed she could not start a family and give life to an heir. She devoted herself to her faith in the God-Emperor, and took a major temple on the capital world under her care. She developed a reputation as a strict but pious matron, and died at an advanced age. No one was around to accept her last words save for the golden image of the God-Emperor installed in her chambers.

traits.locale_text: Since the Sauerback family had been wiped out as punishment for their treason, Lady Jocasta believed she could not start a family and give life to an heir. She devoted herself to her faith in the God-Emperor, and took a major temple on the capital world under her care. She developed a reputation as a strict but pious matron, and died at an advanced age. No one was around to accept her last words save for the golden icon of the God-Emperor installed in her chambers.

Since the Sauerback family had been wiped out as punishment for their treason, Jocasta believed she could not start a family and give life to an heir. She devoted herself to her faith in the God-Emperor, and took a major temple on the capital world under her care. She developed a reputation as a strict but pious matron, and died at an advanced age. No one was around to accept her last words save for the golden image of the God-Emperor installed in her chambers.

languages.text: Nachdem die Sauerback-Familie aufgrund ihres Verrats ausgelöscht worden war, glaubte Jocasta, dass sie keine neue Familie gründen und einen Erben gebären konnte. Also stellte sie ihr Leben in den Dienst des Gottimperators und übernahm die Leitung eines bedeutenden Tempels auf der Hauptwelt. Sie machte sich einen Namen als strenge aber fromme Matrone und starb im hohen Alter. Niemand war bei ihr, um ihre letzten Worte zu hören oder das goldene Bild des Gottimperators in ihren Gemächern zu empfangen.
languages.original_text: Since the Sauerback family had been wiped out as punishment for their treason, Jocasta believed she could not start a family and give life to an heir. She devoted herself to her faith in the God-Emperor, and took a major temple on the capital world under her care. She developed a reputation as a strict but pious matron, and died at an advanced age. No one was around to accept her last words save for the golden image of the God-Emperor installed in her chambers.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem die Sauerback-Familie aufgrund ihres Verrats ausgelöscht worden war, glaubte Jocasta, dass sie keine neue Familie gründen und einen Erben gebären konnte. Also stellte sie ihr Leben in den Dienst des Gottimperators und übernahm die Leitung eines bedeutenden Tempels auf der Hauptwelt. Sie machte sich einen Namen als strenge aber fromme Matrone und starb im hohen Alter. Niemand war bei ihr, um ihre letzten Worte zu hören oder das goldene Bild des Gottimperators in ihren Gemächern zu empfangen.

languages.text: La famille Sauerback ayant été exécutée pour trahison, Jocasta s'interdit d'en fonder une nouvelle en donnant naissance à un héritier. Au lieu de cela, elle se consacra corps et âme à sa foi en l'Empereur-Dieu et prit la direction d'un temple majeur sur le monde-capitale. Au fil des années, elle se tailla une solide réputation pour sa rigueur et sa piété, avant de mourir à un âge avancé. Personne n'était présent pour recueillir ses dernières paroles, exception faite de l'icône dorée de l'Empereur-Dieu qui trônait en bonne place dans ses quartiers.
languages.original_text: Since the Sauerback family had been wiped out as punishment for their treason, Jocasta believed she could not start a family and give life to an heir. She devoted herself to her faith in the God-Emperor, and took a major temple on the capital world under her care. She developed a reputation as a strict but pious matron, and died at an advanced age. No one was around to accept her last words save for the golden image of the God-Emperor installed in her chambers.

traits.locale_text: La famille Sauerback ayant été exécutée pour trahison, Jocasta s'interdit d'en fonder une nouvelle en donnant naissance à un héritier. Au lieu de cela, elle se consacra corps et âme à sa foi en l'Empereur-Dieu et prit la direction d'un temple majeur sur le monde-capitale. Au fil des années, elle se tailla une solide réputation pour sa rigueur et sa piété, avant de mourir à un âge avancé. Personne n'était présent pour recueillir ses dernières paroles, exception faite de l'icône dorée de l'Empereur-Dieu qui trônait en bonne place dans ses quartiers.

languages.text: Puesto que la familia Sauerback había sido exterminada como castigo a su traición, Jocasta creía que no podría empezar una familia y dar a luz a un heredero. Se entregó plenamente a su fe en el Dios Emperador, haciéndose cargo de uno de los grandes templos del mundo capital. Se ganó la reputación de ser una matrona estricta pero pía y murió a una edad avanzada. Sus últimas palabras solo las oyó la imagen dorada del Dios Emperador que había instalada en sus aposentos.
languages.original_text: Since the Sauerback family had been wiped out as punishment for their treason, Jocasta believed she could not start a family and give life to an heir. She devoted herself to her faith in the God-Emperor, and took a major temple on the capital world under her care. She developed a reputation as a strict but pious matron, and died at an advanced age. No one was around to accept her last words save for the golden image of the God-Emperor installed in her chambers.

traits.locale_text: Puesto que la familia Sauerback había sido exterminada como castigo a su traición, Jocasta creía que no podría empezar una familia y dar a luz a un heredero. Se entregó plenamente a su fe en el Dios Emperador, haciéndose cargo de uno de los grandes templos del mundo capital. Se ganó la reputación de ser una matrona estricta pero pía y murió a una edad avanzada. Sus últimas palabras solo las oyó la imagen dorada del Dios Emperador que había instalada en sus aposentos.

languages.text: ザウアーバック家が謀反の罰として族滅されたことから、ジョカスタは家庭を築き、世継ぎを生み出すことはできないと考えていた。彼女は神帝陛下への信仰に身を捧げ、首都惑星の大きな神殿を自身の管理下に置いた。彼女は幻覚ながらも敬虔な女性監督官として評判を得て、年老いた後にこの世を去った。彼女の部屋に置かれていた黄金の神帝陛下の像を除いて、彼女の最期の言葉を受け取ったものはいなかった。
languages.original_text: Since the Sauerback family had been wiped out as punishment for their treason, Jocasta believed she could not start a family and give life to an heir. She devoted herself to her faith in the God-Emperor, and took a major temple on the capital world under her care. She developed a reputation as a strict but pious matron, and died at an advanced age. No one was around to accept her last words save for the golden image of the God-Emperor installed in her chambers.

traits.locale_text: ザウアーバック家が謀反の罰として族滅されたことから、ジョカスタは家庭を築き、世継ぎを生み出すことはできないと考えていた。彼女は神帝陛下への信仰に身を捧げ、首都惑星の大きな神殿を自身の管理下に置いた。彼女は幻覚ながらも敬虔な女性監督官として評判を得て、年老いた後にこの世を去った。彼女の部屋に置かれていた黄金の神帝陛下の像を除いて、彼女の最期の言葉を受け取ったものはいなかった。

languages.text: 苏尔贝克家族犯下了叛国罪被彻底铲除。约卡斯塔认为她不该组建家庭，也不该生育子嗣，于是便全身心地投入了对神皇的信仰之中，还负责打理起了首都世界的其中一座主要神殿。她那严格、虔诚的女总管形象深入人心，最终年迈过世。当她去世的时候，她身边没有任何人聆听她的遗言，只有她房间里的神皇金身塑像陪伴着她。
languages.original_text: Since the Sauerback family had been wiped out as punishment for their treason, Jocasta believed she could not start a family and give life to an heir. She devoted herself to her faith in the God-Emperor, and took a major temple on the capital world under her care. She developed a reputation as a strict but pious matron, and died at an advanced age. No one was around to accept her last words save for the golden image of the God-Emperor installed in her chambers.

traits.locale_text: 苏尔贝克家族犯下了叛国罪被彻底铲除。约卡斯塔认为她不该组建家庭，也不该生育子嗣，于是便全身心地投入了对神皇的信仰之中，还负责打理起了首都世界的其中一座主要神殿。她那严格、虔诚的女总管形象深入人心，最终年迈过世。当她去世的时候，她身边没有任何人聆听她的遗言，只有她房间里的神皇金身塑像陪伴着她。
